org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging

Class Event.EventMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging.Event.EventMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Message
    Enclosing class:
    Event<TARGET_ACTOR_TYPE extends Actor>

    private final class Event.EventMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message
    The message subclass used to pass events. Event messages are not reused, with a new event message being created each time Event.signal is called.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) TARGET_ACTOR_TYPE targetActor
      The actor to be operated on.

      Returns true when the response is to be sent to a message processor created with a different context.
      boolean isResponsePending()
      Returns true when a response is expected but has not yet been placed in the message.

      Process the throwable on the current thread in the context of the active message processor.

      • eval

        public void eval(MessageProcessor _targetMessageProcessor)
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Execute the Event.processEvent or Request.processRequest method of the event/request held by the message. This method is always called on the target message processor's own thread.
        Specified by:
        eval in interface Message
        Parameters:
        _targetMessageProcessor - The message processor whose thread is to evaluate the event/request.
